import React from 'react' import um from './Users.module.css' const Users = (props) => { if(props.Users.length === 0){ props.setUsers([ {id: 1, name: 'Vlad', avalink:'https://mota.ru/upload/wallpapers/source/2016/07/10/22/05/49174/mota.ru_2016071020.jpg', followed:false,status:'hey im a 1', location:{city:'Moscow',country:'Russia'}}, {id: 2, name: 'Maks', avalink:'https://mota.ru/upload/wallpapers/source/2016/07/10/22/05/49174/mota.ru_2016071020.jpg', followed:false,status:'hey im a 2', location:{city:'London',country:'Britania'}}, {id: 3, name: 'Katya', avalink:'https://mota.ru/upload/wallpapers/source/2016/07/10/22/05/49174/mota.ru_2016071020.jpg', followed:false,status:'hey im a 3', location:{city:'Wancuwer',country:'Kanada'}}, {id: 4, name: 'Yana', avalink:'https://mota.ru/upload/wallpapers/source/2016/07/10/22/05/49174/mota.ru_2016071020.jpg', followed:false,status:'hey im a 4', location:{city:'Kiev',country:'Ucraine'}} ]) } return ( props.Users.map(us =>
{us.followed ? : }
{us.name}
{us.status}
{us.location.country} {','}
{us.location.city}
) ) } export default Users
